metadata.description: One of the most powerful figures in the Fathom universe returns for this epic third chapter! Following the tragic events of The Elite Saga and the shattering of her family ties, Kiani has risen above the surface and seemingly disappeared amongst the large expanse of the human population. However, with a power inside her that is capable of changing-or destroying--the world's landscape, her presence can only remain hidden for so long!
metadata.name: Fathom: Kiani Vol. 3
